item.title: Github: The Open Source Solution
item.description: Why is everyone making their projects open source on github? Thats a question that we are going to discuss!

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to TechStrike a website all about technology based new’s and tutorial’s! Here you will find a huge variaty of technology based post’s by some of our best authors. We are looking some authors that want to support our project and create posts for free. Please contact us via the (Google Forms)[https://techstrikes.charisios.com] link.
